are helping to protect an estuary area in
California from erosion.
All they need to do is eat a
lot. These ocean fish and
their big mouths are helping save the
lagoon. El sea otters eat their mouths and one of
their favorite foods is
lagoon crabs.  Swamp crabs, also known as striped shore crabs,
these crabs dig burrows and gnaw on the roots of
plants that have the effect of holding the
soil on the banks of the swamp.
Large swaths of the soil there are being heavily damaged by the crabs, leading to their
caves.
Dr. Simon's research

crab levels, thereby slowing down the erosion process
in nearby wetlands.  Bay of Monteri the fish pee

Unesco calls Bolero songs

Ho Chi Minh City police have just discovered a
large-scale production and trade line of fake modern medicine, a serious incident that
directly affects the health of animals.
This incident happened at the
Chi Chi cosmetics company in the district where Truong Thi Hong
Lac is the
director. According to the investigation agency, Lac
ordered from many sources
paper packaging, labels, plastic bottles, and buttons based on
Plastic bottle caps are used for the production of
fake western medicine, then Lac directs
workers to mix the modified medicine solution
into plastic bottles and close the plastic stoppers to
create fake branded modern medicine bottles,
then Lac hires Tran Tinh Sinh.  born in 1993,
living in Soc Trang, and Duong Thi Quyen Tran,
born in 1985, living in District 8, carrying cool labels and
delivering them to customers. When a customer
buys the suspect's medicine, they will receive a difference
of 900,000 VND for each box of fake private medicine.  The
Economic Police Department
simultaneously conducted searches at five
related counterfeit drug production and distribution sites. The
police confiscated many items
estimated to have a total value of hundreds of millions of
dong. The Dong Thap Provincial Department prosecuted the case of violation

Thap Economic Police Department coordinated with

over 5 tons, and Nguyen Thi

Cao Lanh city, initially admitted that the
above crocodiles were bought from Cambodia and
transported to Vietnam to consume the fish.  Crocodiles
